questions.question: A lot of people have heard of the asteroid belt, which lives between Mars and Jupiter, right?
I mean, I think like these days with music, music is a great example, right?
The absurd question I have to ask, what is the greatest song of all time?
Maybe can you give an overview of the role music has played in your life?
Do the thing that fills your life with interest, and, you know, do that perpetually, right?
And I'm in a privileged position of being able to, you know, to have that be my job, right?
